nodes.bodyText:
I couldn't get the test to pass in Travis CI without explicitly specifying the region (locally it works fine).
I'm getting the following message: "com.amazonaws.SdkClientException: Unable to find a region via the region provider chain. Must provide an explicit region in the builder or setup environment to supply a region."
I've decided to provide the region explicitly (like we do in the S3ChangeLogStore and AwsPrivateKeyStor
e) just to be on the safe side.
